intro: Guettarda hypoglauca, commonly known as the white guettarda, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of the Americas, particularly Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its small, white or pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are simple, opposite, and often have a glossy surface. Guettarda hypoglauca is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive foliage and delicate flowers.
